refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A bibliodiv is a section of a bibliography. A bibliography might be divided into sections in order to group different types of sources together, like books, journal articles, web sites, and so on.
A bibliography may contain any number of biblioentry or bibliomixed elements or any number of bibliodivs, but it cannot contain a mixture of both at the same level.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Some systems may display only those entries within a bibliodiv that are cited in the containing document. This may be an interchange issue. See .
